TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstanceDataCollectionCollection extends System.Collections.DictionaryBase

summary.span: 提供 对象的强类型集合。

span.span: Provides a strongly typed collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示从方法返回的集合 。The class represents the collection returned from the method. 此集合包含所有计数器和实例数据。This collection contains all the counter and instance data. 集合包含 每个计数器的对象。The collection contains an object for each counter. 每个 对象都包含该实例的所有计数器的性能数据。Each object contains the performance data for all counters for that instance. 因此，按计数器名称和实例名称对数据进行索引。Thus, the data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示了本地计算机上特定的实例数据 。The following code example displays the instance data for a particular on the local computer. 它首先显示名称的编号列表 。It first displays a numbered list of names. 用户输入其中一个类别的编号后，此示例将获取的 。After the user enters the number of one of the categories, the example gets the for that . 然后，它将属性返回的集合转换 为对象的数组 。It then converts the collection returned by the property to an array of objects. 该示例显示与 每个关联的实例数据 。The example displays the instance data associated with each of each . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(string counterName) cil managed
Public Function Contains (counterName As String) As Boolean

span.span: The name of the performance counter.

summary.span: 确定集合中是否存在指定计数器的实例数据集合（由索引 对象之一来标识）。

span.span: Determines whether an instance data collection for the specified counter (identified by one of the indexed objects) exists in the collection.

returns.span: 如果集合中存在包含指定计数器的实例数据集合，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an instance data collection containing the specified counter exists in the collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `counterName`参数不区分大小写。The `counterName` parameter is case-insensitive. 集合中的每个 对象都包含一个实例的所有计数器的性能数据。Each object in the collection contains the performance data for all counters for an instance. 数据按计数器名称和实例名称进行索引。The data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name. `true`如果有一个对象的 关联计数器具有参数指定的名称，则返回 `counterName` 。 returns `true` if there is an object whose associated counter has the name specified by the `counterName` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从命令行接受类别名称和计数器名称。The following code example accepts a category name and counter name from the command line. 它获取的， 然后使用 方法来确定指定的计数器是否存在。It gets the for the and then uses the method to determine if the specified counter exists. 如果该计数器存在，则该示例获取关联的， 并显示集合中的实例名称。If the counter exists, the example gets the associated and displays the instance names from the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/CS/instdatacolcolitermcontains.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/VB/instdatacolcolitemcontains.vb#2)]

The location at which to add the new instances.

summary.span: 将 实例数组复制到集合中的指定索引处。

span.span: Copies an array of instances to the collection, at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 方法将转换为 对象数组。The following code example uses the method to convert an into an array of objects. 数组的每个元素 都被传递给函数以进行进一步处理。Each element of the array is passed to a function for further processing. MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(counterName As String) As InstanceDataCollection

span.span: The name of the performance counter.

summary.span: 获取指定计数器的实例数据。

span.span: Gets the instance data for the specified counter.

value.span: 一个 项，将根据它对 对象进行索引。

span.span: An item, by which the object is indexed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `counterName`参数不区分大小写。The `counterName` parameter is case-insensitive. 集合中的每个 对象都包含一个实例的所有计数器的性能数据。Each object in the collection contains the performance data for all counters for an instance. 数据按计数器名称和实例名称进行索引。The data is indexed by counter name and then by instance name. 索引器使用 `counterName` 参数逐句通过与此实例数据集合关联的计数器。The indexer uses the `counterName` parameter to step through the counters associated with this collection of instance data. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 从命令行接受类别名称和计数器名称。The following code example accepts a category name and counter name from the command line. 它获取的 。It gets the for the . 然后，如果 存在，则该示例使用 (引用为索引器) 来获取关联的， 并显示集合中的实例名称。Then, if the exists, the example uses the property (referenced as an indexer) to obtain the associated and displays the instance names from the collection. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/CS/instdatacolcolitermcontains.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceDataCollectionCollection.ItemContains/VB/instdatacolcolitemcontains.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Keys As ICollection
public: property System::Collections::ICollection ^ Keys { System::Collections::ICollection ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对象和与该实例数据集合关联的对象的计数器注册表项。

span.span: Gets the object and counter registry keys for the objects associated with this instance data collection.

value.span: 表示一组对象特定的注册表项的 。

span.span: An that represents a set of object-specific registry keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个软件组件在安装时创建其对象和计数器的密钥，并在执行时写入计数器数据。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 你可以像访问任何其他注册表数据一样访问此数据。You can access this data as you would access any other registry data. 但是，尽管你使用注册表来收集性能数据，但数据并不存储在注册表数据库中。However, although you use the registry to collect performance data, the data is not stored in the registry database. 相反，系统从适当的系统对象管理器收集数据。Instead, the system collects the data from the appropriate system object managers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 属性 来返回计数器名称的集合，该集合将转换为的数组 。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of counter names, which it converts to an array of . 它 使用属性生成对象的数组 。It generates an array of objects using the property. 对于计数器名称数组中的每个元素，它将显示名称并调用函数来处理关联的 。For each element in the array of counter names, it displays the name and calls a function to process the associated . [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#4)]

summary.span: 获取组成计数器实例集合的实例数据值。

span.span: Gets the instance data values that comprise the collection of instances for the counter.

value.span: 一个 ，它表示计数器的实例和它们的关联数据值。

span.span: An that represents the counter's instances and their associated data values.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用的 属性 来返回对象的集合 ，并将其转换为数组。The following code example uses the property of an to return a collection of objects, which it converts to an array. 它使用属性生成计数器名称的数组 。It generates an array of counter names using the property. 对于对象数组中的每个元素 ，它显示关联的计数器名称并调用一个函数来处理 。For each element in the array of objects, it displays the associated counter name and calls a function to process the . [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/CS/instdatakeysvalues.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.InstanceData.KeysValues/VB/instdatakeysvalues.vb#4)]
